DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Report Serious Adverse Event Report Association Yes No Coded Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric code to signify whether laboratory reports are added to an expedited adverse event report.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Report Serious Adverse Event Report Association
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products._A short textual account; having provided a short account._A document describing a serious adverse event that occurred during a clinical trial._A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products.:A short textual account; having provided a short account.

Concepts.definition: A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.

Property.preferredDefinition: A document describing a serious adverse event that occurred during a clinical trial.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Concepts.definition: Records describing a serious adverse event that occurred during a clinical trial.
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Yes or No response to a question coded as 1 (Yes) or 2 (No).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI caAERS integration with Rave 6.2014 D.Reeves
